Detailed Description

Graphics scene of the cell colony in the Qt Graphics framework.

Contains the list of pointers to the GraphicsCell objects, defines method to add and remove cells, defines access to a cell through the [] operator.

void GraphicsCellScene::setCellPosition ( int  cellIndex,
double  x,
double  y 
)

Set the position of cell with index cellIndex.

Input coordinates are in the simulation coordinates system with range [0,1] and conversion to Graphics coordinate is automatically done.

Member Data Documentation

GraphicsCellGroup* GraphicsCellScene::cellGroup_ [protected]

GraphicsItem group of all the cells.

int GraphicsCellScene::nCells_ [protected]

Number of cells in the list of GraphicsCell objects.

QList<GraphicsCell*> GraphicsCellScene::cellsList_ [protected]

List of pointers to the cells in the colony scene.

This list should never be deleted because the ODE simulation needs it.

double GraphicsCellScene::colonySize_ [protected]

Size of the coordinate system for cell position.

It defines the area of coordinate system for the cell position in the graphic scene. Coordinates are transformed from [0,1] (simulator_ coordinates) to [-colonySize_/2, colonySize/2] (graphic scene coordinates).
